channel.title: Making PvP Non PvP[im useing barragek0's source] SOM1 PLEASEEEEE HELP MEEE!

item.title: Making PvP Non PvP[im useing barragek0's source] SOM1 PLEASEEEEE HELP MEEE!
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

I know, I know. It’s been asked a zillion times b4. But i can’t find it anywhere. I’m useing Barragek0’s source. And when i try it. It doesn’t work. It just stays PvP. This is the public void thing…

public boolean nonWildPvP() { if (absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3226 && absY <= 3218) { if (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2668 && absY >= 3226 && absY <= 3409) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Now, when i make another one…
I get 100 errors. Any help will be appreciated.

Read full topic
